prompt_base: photograph of a muscular middle-aged man, very tanned skin, large voluminous black afro hairstyle, thick black horseshoe mustache, wearing a white cape over a brown martial arts gi, boisterous expression
feature_prompt: RAW photo, 8k dslr, cinematic studio lighting, extreme detailed skin wrinkles and pores, visible chest hair texture, detailed hair strands in afro, highly textured fabric
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, CGI, plastic texture, smooth skin, bald, helmet hair, doll, toy, flat lighting, exaggerated smile, low quality, bad hands
